channel.title: GodGame on PRG-YouTube
channel.description: Recent content in GodGame on PRG-YouTube

item.title: Land 9 - Aztec Homeland (Final Land) | Black & White 2
item.description: I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! If you want to play this game, make sure to install the latest Fan Patch (can be found here: https://forum.bwgame.net/threads/running-black-white-2-on-windows-10.7917/) Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here! https://youtu.be/X3WZ9OI5_uU Tags on this video: ‘BW’, ‘PRG’, ‘GodGame’, ‘White’, ‘Classic’, ‘Game’, ‘God’, ‘Evil’, ‘Strategy’, ‘BW2’, ‘Black’, ‘Good’, ‘Gameplay’, ‘Video Game’, ‘Gaming’, ‘Tips’, ‘Efficient’, ‘Black & White 2’

item.title: Land 5 - Nemesis' Banishment (Final Land) | Black & White
item.description: If this video makes your hands itch to play Black & White 1 as again as well, make sure to install the patches v1.1, v1.2 and most important the Fan Patch v 1.41! The Fan Patch fixes a lot of issue on modern computers and makes the game look way better! Find the install guide and all patches here: https://www.bwfiles.com/forum/index.php?topic=7916.0 I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!
